scenes.background: [Monica] sighs as she looks at [Bob] and you.
scenes.description: 'What if people end up unhappy with the majority decision?'

options.text: We could have a discussion to ensure everyone's concerns are heard.
options.analysis: You suggested a discussion to address concerns, showing good perception and empathy but moderate social skills and self-regulation.

options.text: If we explain the decision process, people might be more accepting.
options.analysis: You proposed explaining the decision process to gain acceptance, showing good self-regulation and motivation but moderate perception and empathy.

options.text: Sometimes, we can't please everyone. We just have to move forward.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the difficulty of pleasing everyone and suggested moving forward, showing good social skills and motivation but lower empathy.
